alert.note: Alert for Lower Rio Grande Valley; San Agustin Plains and Adjacent Lowlands; South Central Highlands; Southwest Mountains (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 17 at 8:51PM MDT until March 18 at 3:00AM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 AM MDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations up to two inches. * WHERE...Lower Rio Grande Valley, San Agustin Plains and Adjacent Lowlands, South Central Highlands, and Southwest Mountains. * WHEN...Until 3 AM MDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on snow packed or icy road conditions. This includes portions of I-25 and U.S. 60.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions, dial 511 or 1.800.432.4269, or visit http://nmroads.com.

area.areaDesc: Lower Rio Grande Valley; San Agustin Plains and Adjacent Lowlands; South Central Highlands; Southwest Mountains
